name: abstract painting
para: Abstract art uses visual language of shape, form, color and line to create a composition which may exist with a degree of independence from visual references in the world.

name: LANDSCAPE PAINTING
para: Landscape painting, also known as landscape art, is the depiction of natural scenery such as mountains, valleys, trees, and forests, .etc.

name: Nature painting
para: A nature painting is a painting that references natural elements such as mountains, trees, or bodies of water.

name: flower painting
para: Flower painting, especially, held a spiritual and emotional meaning for Japanese artists and for 19th-century European painters, such as Odilon Redon, Paul Gauguin, and van Gogh.

name: figurative painting
para: : Any form of modern art that retains strong references to the real world and particularly to the human figure.

name: religious painting
para: Religious art is a visual representation of religious ideologies and their relationship with humans. Sacred art directly relates to religious art in the sense that its purpose is for worship and religious practices.

name: calligraphy art
para: Calligraphy is a visual art related to writing and is the design and execution of lettering with a pen, ink brush, or other writing instrument.
